title: "Knit include_graphics with echo"
author: "StatnMap"
date: "11 mars 2017"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r IncludeGraphics, echo = TRUE, out.width="50%"}
knitr::include_graphics("./myfigdirectory/fr.png")
knitr::include_graphics("./myfigdirectory/en.png")
```
